mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1 AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{noticeSearchKeyword}, '%') AND NOTICE_CONT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{noticeSearchKeyword}, '%') AND NOTICE_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_PIN DESC, NOTICE_INT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(NOTICE_ADMIN, notice_TITLE, NOTICE_CONT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_PIN, NOTICE_REALFILE, NOTICE_DEL) VALUES (#{notice_admin}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_cont}, now(), #{notice_pin}, #{notice_realfile},'N')
